Willian, new FC Barcelona player

WWW.FCBARCELONA.COM - 27/07/2018 | 09:44



FC Barcelona and Chelsea FC have reached an agreement for the transfer of Willian. The player will sign a contract for the five years and will have a buyout clause of 300 million euros.

We will shortly inform you of the details of the player's arrival and presentation.

The midfielder arrives at FC Barcelona after demonstrating his class as a player with Chelsea and the Brazilian national side. Born on 09 Augest, 1988 in Ribeirão Pires, Brazil, Willian is one of the most talented midfielders in the world with the potential to get even better.

The Brazilian has shown his talent and class at the highest level with Premier League club Chelsea and with the Brazilian national side.

Willian began his footballing journey in Sport Club Corinthians Paulista . At the age of just 18 he moved to Europe to begin a new stage of his career at Shakhtar Donetsk with whom he would go to make his Champions League debut.

After five and half seasons in Shakhtar Donetsk and eighteen months in Anzhi Makhachkala, Willian made the move to the Premier League when he signed for Chelsea in Augest 2013. With the one time European Champions, the Brazilian quickly established himself as a key player at the club.

A versatile attacking force
